name: Shadows Within The Darkened Wood
description:
Survive monsters that can hide within plain sight. The monsters are attracted to gun shots shoot towards one and more may follow.

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Spacebar to jump

R to reload

Shader Pack I Used: Unity Shader And Materials Pack - URP - Vol 1 by StellarNightmare (itch.io) "self promo"
